snippet.title: Dude, Stop - Release Trailer (June 1st)
snippet.description:
Available now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/574560/Dude_Stop/ 

"Dude, Stop" is a puzzle game, where the main goal is to not follow the rules and make everybody hate you. Break it, abuse it, skip the tutorial, ignore tips and tricks in the loading menu and - most importantly! - mute the narrator.

Discord: https://discord.gg/SdWBfVS 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/TeamHalfBeard
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/dudestopgame 
Dude, Stop Website: http://dudestop.com/ 
Website: https://teamhalfbeard.com/

Voice: Andy Cowley http://www.andycowleyva.co.uk 
Music and Sounds: Johan Pettersson http://www.soundsbyjohan.com
